3.title: Pooh's Badful Day/Sleuthin' in the Wind
3.plot: When Pooh falls out of bed after a bad dream, he's sure that it's the start of a badful day. Tigger and Darby aren't so sure, until a thunderstorm comes and the birds start chirping. Determined to help out, Tigger and Darby convince Pooh to join them as the Super Sleuths and find away to turn his badful day around. It's a hard task and muddy at times, but they work their way through. Sleuthin' in the Wind: On a very windy day, the Super Sleuths get a call from Piglet, who's afraid that he'll be blown away if he goes outside. They work to keep him safe, but also try to...

4.title: You're a Big Boy, Roo/Turtle's for the Birds
4.plot: Roo is given an important job by his Mom-- to pick up her pouch watch from Rabbit who has been repairing it. Roo gets the watch, but then loses it when he stops to play. Worried that his Mom won't think him a big boy anymore, he calls on the Super Sleuths to help him find it. They assist him with his problem, but then a later problem comes up that he can only solve on his own. Turtle's for the Birds: Turtle loves birdwatching and draws the birds that he watches, but there's one bird that he's never seen. The rare flume-plumed speckled boom-whacker. It only comes to ...

6.title: Tigger's Invitation Frustration/Darby's Halloween Case
6.plot: Tigger's Invitation Frustration: Lumpy is having a birthday party. All of his friends have received invitations, except for Tigger. Tigger is worried that Lumpy decided not to invite him, but Darby and Pooh are certain that there's been some kind of mistake. They decide to call together the Super Sleuths to find out what's happening with Tigger's invitation. Darby's Halloween Case: When Turtle holds a Halloween party in his cave, things start getting a little too scary. Everyone hears strange noises and things start moving seemingly on their own. They become convinced...

9.title: Bursting Pooh's Bubble/Beaver Gets Skunked
9.plot: Bursting Pooh's Bubble: One day while out blowing bubbles, Roo and Lumpy get the idea to create a really big bubble. Pooh tries to catch their bubble, but instead of catching it ends up becoming trapped inside it. When Pooh and the bubble bounce into a tree, Lumpy and Roo call for the help of the remaining Super Sleuths. They face a duel problem-- first getting Pooh down from the tree and then getting him out of a bubble that seemingly will not break. Beaver Gets Skunked: When Beaver spots Skunk near his dam, he calls on the Super Sleuths to shoo him away. This is one...

10.title: Porcupine Comes to Her Senses/Rabbit and Turtle's Re-Run
10.plot: Porcupine Comes to Her Senses: When Porcupine loses her glasses, she calls on the Super Sleuths to help find them. Without her glasses, Porcupine is near-blind, but she joins the Super Sleuths as they journey to find her glasses. As they retrace her steps to locate the lost glasses, they learn along the way how powerful senses other than vision can be. Rabbit and Turtle's Re-Run: Rabbit and Turtle call the Super Sleuths, hoping that they can help them resolve a heated argument. Both are sure that it was their grandfather who won a race from the days of yore against ...

12.title: Lumpy's Downhill Battle/Darby's Squirmy Worms
12.plot: Roo can't seem to teach Lumpy to ski, so he calls the Super Sleuths for help. The Sleuths come up with a number of ideas that seem to be helpful at first, but Lumpy still fails when it comes to skiing. Lumpy is ready to give up, but then his Mama Heffalump appears and urges him to wear his scarf. Lumpy gets the idea that it's a magic scarf that will help him to be a great skier. Darby's Squirmy Worms: When Rabbit discovers that his garden is full of worms, he treats them as a hostile invasion force. He calls the Super Sleuths to remove them. The Sleuths agree, even ...

14.title: Porcupine's Missing Flute/Darby's Picture Perfect Day
14.plot: Porcupine is getting ready for an upcoming concert, but finds herself needing to make a quick trip to Heffalump Hollow, so she leaves her flute on the log where she was resting. When she gets back, she finds that the flute is gone, so she calls the Super Sleuths for help. The Super Sleuths set to uncovering the clues and are dismayed to find that the evidence seems to point to Turtle's having taken the flute. Sure that there's some explanation, they decide to seek him out, but he proves difficult to track down. Darby's Picture Perfect Day: Darby's school has recently ...

1.title: Rabbit's Ruta-Awakening/Tigger's Shadow of a Doubt
1.plot: The Super Sleuths investigate the disappearance of rutabagas from Rabbit's garden; Tigger is upset when he loses his best bouncing buddy: his shadow.

2.title: How to Say I Love Roo/Piglet's Small Predicament
2.plot: Roo wants to make a special gift for I Love You Day; Pooh's honey pots start disappearing.

3.title: Piglet's Piglet's Echo Echo/Roo's Kite-tastrophy
3.plot: Piglet believes somebody is stuck in a cave after hearing his echo; Roo needs help retrieving his stuck kite.

4.title: Eeyore's Tale of the Missing Tail/Pooh Light Up My Life
4.plot: The Super Sleuths assist Eeyore in finding his lost tail; Lumpy is curious about the flashing lights of fireflies.

5.title: Lumpy Spends the Night/Good Night to Pooh
5.plot: Lumpy needs help during a sleepover at Roo's; Rabbit believes that Pooh should hibernate.

6.title: Eeyore's Sad Day/Tigger's Bedtime for Bouncer
6.plot: Eeyore is especially sad over the loss of his favorite dandelion field; Tigger stays up extra-late and dozes off during a case.

7.title: No Rumbly in Pooh's Tumbly/Pooh Sticks Get Stuck
7.plot: Pooh believes he has lost the "rumbly" in his "tumbly"; Pooh and his friends meet a new friend when their sticks get stuck during a game of Pooh Sticks.

8.title: Buster's Ruff Day/Lumpy's Pet Project
8.plot: The Super Sleuths attempt to teach Darby's dog, Buster, to talk; Darby attempts to help Roo care for his friend Max's pet, but is missing important information.

9.title: You Ain't Just Whistlin', Tigger/Piglet's Hole Problem
9.plot: Tigger tries to learn how to whistle; Piglet's hole has mysteriously vanished.

10.title: Tigger Goes for the Jagular/Rabbit's New Roomie
10.plot: Tigger believes that he is actually a jagular; Tigger proves to be an unpleasant house guest for Rabbit

11.title: Pooh-rates of the Hundred Acre Wood/Tigger's Hiccup Pickup
11.plot: Lumpy and Roo decide to be pooh-rates and search for treasure; Tigger's hiccups jeopardize Rabbit's rutabaga potluck party.

12.title: Darby's Tail/Tigger's Delivery Service
12.plot: Darby wishes she had a tail like her friends; Tigger is overworked when he starts a delivery service.

13.title: Super-Sized Darby/Piglet's Lightning Frightening
13.plot: Rabbit's special potion causes Darby to grow to a giant's size; the Super Sleuths try to help Piglet be less afraid of lightning.

14.title: Chasing Pooh's Rainbow/Lumpy Mixes a Mystery
14.plot: Pooh wants to find a honey pot at the end of a rainbow; Lumpy needs help painting a birdhouse purple.

15.title: Porcupine's Pen Pal/Piglet's Thousand and One Watermelons
15.plot: Porcupine's Pen Pal -- Porcupine is excited that her pen pal is coming to visit, however she fears disappointing him by not being able to give him the hug he wants for fear of hurting him until the Super Sleuths find out something interesting about her pen pal that saves the day. -- Piglet's One Thousand and One Watermelons. Rabbit keeps bringing Piglet watermelons and Piglet has no idea what to do with them so he calls on the Super Sleuths to help him. The Sleuths decide to invite the entire Woods to a Watermelon Party but Rabbit shows up offering more watermelons ...

16.title: Eeyore's Trip to the Moon/The Incredible Shrinking Roo
16.plot: Eeyore wishes he could travel to the moon; when Roo is measured, he appears to have shrunk.

17.title: Eeyore's Home Sweet Home/Rabbit's Prized Pumpkin
17.plot: The Super Sleuths try to make a better home for Eeyore; Rabbit's prized pumpkin needs protection from the dangers of the Hundred Acre Wood.

18.title: Many Thanks for Christopher Robin/Turtle's Need for Speed
18.plot: The Super Sleuths search for woozles to invite the Many Thanks Day celebration; Turtle needs help to not be late for his daily checkers game with Rabbit.

19.title: Pooh's Double Trouble/Eeyore Sleeps on It
19.plot: Pooh and his friends believe that they are seeing their doubles; the Super Sleuths investigate why Eeyore keeps sleepwalking.

20.title: Darby's Tooth and Nothin' But the Tooth/Snow Problem, Roo
20.plot: When Darby loses a tooth, Pooh and Tigger search for it; Roo is upset when his snowman starts to melt.

21.title: Symphony for a Rabbit/Tigger Goes Snowflakey
21.plot: The Super Sleuths help Rabbit with his concert when he breaks his orchestra machine; Tigger searches for two identical snowflakes when a misunderstanding makes him believe that Rabbit won't be his friend anymore if he doesn't.

22.title: Buster's Bath/Once in a Pooh Moon
22.plot: Buster needs a bath after chasing squirrels; Lumpy's moon party is derailed when it seems that the moon is missing.

23.title: Lumpy's Alvin Goes to Pieces/Rabbit's Eggcellent Adventure
23.plot: The Super Sleuths must repair Lumpy's favorite stuffed toy, Alvin, when Buster shreds it; the Super Sleuths must split up two solve two mysteries, one involving a bird and the other involving an egg.

24.title: Flowers from Roo/Peck Peck Peckin' on Rabbit's Door
24.plot: An influx of butterflies appears in the Hundred Acre Wood; the knocking of a woodpecker ruins Rabbit's sleep.

25.title: Christopher Froggin'/Piglet's Rocky Problem
25.plot: Darby believes she accidentally turned Christopher Robin into a frog by using magic; the Sleuths deal with the twin problems of Piglet having a boulder blocking his door and Tigger missing his Super Sleuther suit.

26.title: Darby, Solo Sleuth/Doggone Buster
26.plot: Darby must search for soup ingredients on her own when Pooh and Tigger are laid up with a cold; while out playing, Darby loses track of Buster.

1.title: Darby Goes Woozle Sleuthin'/How the Tigger Lost His Stripe
1.plot: The Super Sleuths help Lumpy and Roo look for the Woozle Wizard/Darby and Pooh help Tigger find his missing stripe after Roo paints a picture of him.

2.title: Tigger Gets Bounced/Super Sleuths Wait Forever

3.title: Pooh's Cookie Tree/Lumpy Joins In
3.plot: Pooh's Cookie Tree: When a cookie falls on Pooh's head from a tree, he figures that it must be a cookie tree. Finding this a delightful idea, he calls upon the Super Sleuths to see if there's a way he can have one in his yard. Meanwhile, Lumpy and Roo find themselves facing a mystery when the cookies they were delivering to Heffalump Hollow go missing. Lumpy Joins In: Lumpy has always wanted to sing a choir, but the Heffalump choir is only for adults. He's delighted when Rabbit starts a choir and promises to include everyone. Lumpy's unique brand of singing, however, ...

4.title: Small's World After All/Darby's Fog-Gone Mystery

5.title: Rabbit's Sound of Silence/Eager Beaver
5.plot: Rabbit's Sound of Silence: Rabbit is trying to bake a special cake for Porcupine's birthday party, one that pops if not made in complete silence. Unfortunately, Beaver is working on a log right outside his home and making a lot of noise. Rabbit calls upon the help of the Super Sleuths, who find that keeping things quiet is easier said (or not said) than done. Eager Beaver: The Super Sleuths have been receiving many calls lately, leaving them exhausted and with no time to play. Hearing about their problem, Beaver decides to join the team and give them some help. Beaver...

7.title: No More Honey for Pooh/Stuck Be a Piglet

8.title: Piglet's Nutty Problem/Missing Lumpy
8.plot: Piglet loses his special acorn and the sleuths help him search for it; Roo needs to be cheered up when Lumpy leaves to visit relatives.

9.title: Darby's Lost and Found/Piglet's Mystery Pet
9.plot: Darby's Lost and Found: When Piglet calls the Super Sleuths about a missing sock, they realize that things have lately been disappearing around the Hundred Acre Wood at an alarming rate. The items have seemingly vanished without a trace and they wonder if they might be disappearing to some mysterious Land of the Lost. They set up a stakeout that leads them to a surprising discovery. Piglet's Mystery Pet: When Piglet finds what appears to be a fish stranded in a puddle of water, he adopts it as his very own pet and names it Squiggly. When Squiggly grows legs, Piglet ...

10.title: Piglet's Lost Voice/Funny Rabbit
10.plot: Piglet is excited about singing for his friends and has been practicing hard. When he learns that flyer's have been posted to announce his performance, he seems excited, but then find that he can no longer sing. Convinced that Piglet has lost his voice, the Super Sleuths spring into action. Funny Rabbit: Pooh and his friends are sure that Rabbit doesn't know how to have fun because he never wants to play games with them and often seems to be grumpy. As the Super Sleuths, they try to teach Rabbit the meaning of having fun. Their methods include jokes and games, but ...

11.title: Tigger's Day at the You-See-Um/Skunk's Non-Scents

12.title: It's Eeyore Birthday/The Tiglet and Pigger Switcher
12.plot: It's Eeyore Birthday: When Eeyore calls the Super Sleuths for a case, they learn that he doesn't know when his birthday is. He's never had a birthday party in his life, but would like to have one. They try to put together the best party ever for him, but start to become frustrated when things keep going wrong. The Tiglet and Pigger Switcher: When Roo performs a magic trick intended to make Tigger and Piglet switch barrels, the two end up swapping personalities instead. Piglet begins bouncing all over the place, while Tigger displays a pronounced lack of courage and an...

14.title: Darby's Wheelie Big Problem/Turtle Comes Out of His Shell
14.plot: Following a particularly messy case, the Super Sleuths find that their scooters need a good cleaning. With the scooters out of commission for the time being, Pooh and Tigger substitute bicycles. Both are very fast on them, but Darby's still using training wheels. She'd like to be able to go as fast as the others, but is scared that she's going to fall. Turtle Comes Out of His Shell: Turtle decides that the doesn't need his shell anymore-- it's only getting in his way. He calls upon the Super Sleuths to help him find fun new shell-free activities to do. When he finds ...

15.title: Darby's Pony/Rabbit's Not So Scary-Crow
15.plot: Seeing that Darby is always reading a book about a girl and her pony, Pooh and Tigger get the idea that Darby really wants a pony. They make it a Super Sleuth case of their very own and try to figure out how to get her one. They decide to enlist Eeyore's help, making him into a pony for Darby. Rabbit's Not So Scary-Crow: Rabbit's scarecrow, Theodore, is no longer doing its job and the crows just laugh at it. Rabbit calls in the Super Sleuths to help and they come up with any number of ideas to scare of their crows. They find, however, that their ideas work best when ...

18.title: Darby the Plant-Sitter/Pooh's Nightingale
18.plot: Darby the Plant-Sitter: When Rabbit goes on a trip, he asks Darby to take care of his garden. Darby happily agrees to the job and puts her best effort into the task, but begins to worry that she's not a good plant-sitter. She notices a certain group of plants that have only leaves and don't otherwise appear to be growing. She decides to call together the Super Sleuths to come up with ways to make the plants grow. plot: A girl and her dog have adventures with tigger and pooh in the hundred acre woods
